text: I got a cheese sub (a personal pizza folded in half) and spaghetti. The sub is so buttery and cheesy. It was amazing! I ate it too fast to take a picture. Three spaghetti has a layer of cheese baked over it and comes with a large piece of parmesan bread. It is so good! I highly recommend!
